author: fwyzard
body:
Backport commit alpaka-group/alpaka@8d4b8df9f1d0477e685e8d1581326b65707f404d to the current alpaka branch:

> Implement logical operations on `alpaka::Vec`.
> Protect all `constexpr` comparisons from old NVCC versions.
title: Minimal backport of fixes and updates to alpaka::Vec
